text:
Hi. This case is probably for the HubSpot Team. So, I have this weird problem with HubSpot's Session -theme.
1. Session -theme works fine
2. I clone the theme, so I can make changes to it. 
3. When I start to create pages with the cloned theme -> drag and drop element won't show me the Section and Column choices when hovering mouse over content elements (screenshot below). Because of this I can't delete Sections from the page. I can only go to the Sections -settings. 
4. I think that the problem is that edit page gives multiple 403 errors from the svg-files (screenshot below). This happens with all different templates inside the theme. Here is a one example of those 403 address: <https://static.hsappstatic.net/content-icons-ui/static-1.1425/images/fontawesome-5.0.10/Rookie/images/module-icons/list-view.svg/default.svg>
Accound ID: 8270041
Cloned theme name: Rookie
